output these songs as const data = \[ so I can paste them in appropriately. Then update the view code so that it also presents all the data in the following data type including the genre, tags and release date Respect | Aretha Franklin | Respect | This song is an anthem for respect and equality. Aretha Franklin's powerful voice and the song's catchy rhythm encourage listeners to demand respect in their relationships and interactions. It's a timeless reminder of the importance of treating others with dignity and respect. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6FOUqQt3Kg0 We Are the World | USA for Africa | Unity | The song was a call for unity and cooperation in the face of global issues. Its lyrics inspire listeners to put aside differences and work together for a common cause. The song is a powerful reminder of the impact we can have when we unite as a global community. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M9BNoNFKCBI Bridge Over Troubled Water | Simon & Garfunkel | Empathy | This song is a comforting ballad about providing support to someone in their time of need. Its lyrics inspire listeners to be there for others, offering comfort and understanding during difficult times. It's a beautiful expression of empathy and solidarity. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H\_a46WJ1viA Beautiful Day | U2 | Optimism | The song encourages listeners to see the beauty in every day, even when things aren't going as planned. Its uplifting lyrics and energetic melody inspire listeners to maintain a positive outlook and to appreciate the simple joys of life. It's a powerful reminder of the beauty that exists in our world, if we only take the time to look. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=co6WMzDOh1o You've Got a Friend | James Taylor | Friendship | This song is a heartwarming tribute to the power of friendship. Its lyrics reassure listeners that they're not alone and that they can rely on their friends for support and companionship. It's a timeless reminder of the importance of maintaining strong relationships and the comfort that comes from knowing someone is there for you. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xEkIou3WFnM Heroes | David Bowie | Bravery | The song encourages listeners to embrace their inner bravery and to stand up for what they believe in. Its powerful lyrics and melody inspire listeners to be their own heroes, regardless of the challenges they may face. It's a timeless anthem for courage and self-belief. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tgcc5V9Hu3g Stand By Me | Ben E. King | Loyalty | This song is a classic anthem of loyalty and commitment. Its lyrics express the importance of standing by those you care about, through thick and thin. It's a timeless reminder of the importance of loyalty in our relationships and the comfort that comes from knowing someone will always be there for you. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hwZNL7QVJjE Hey Jude | The Beatles | Comfort | The song offers comfort and encouragement during difficult times. Its lyrics suggest that no matter what obstacles we face, there's always a way to make things better. The message of the song is uplifting and hopeful, inspiring listeners to take a sad song and make it better. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A\_MjCqQoLLA In My Life | The Beatles | Love, Reflection | 1965 | Rock | The song encourages listeners to cherish their memories and the people who have touched their lives. Its lyrics reflect on past experiences with nostalgia and affection, creating a sense of gratitude and love for the journey of life. | Tags: Love, Nostalgia, Gratitude | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YBcdt6DsLQA Born to Run | Bruce Springsteen | Freedom, Passion | 1975 | Rock | This song is a spirited anthem about the pursuit of freedom and the passion to live life on one's own terms. Its energetic melody and empowering lyrics inspire listeners to embrace their dreams and to never stop chasing them. | Tags: Freedom, Passion, Motivation | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxuThNgl3YA Landslide | Fleetwood Mac | Personal Growth, Change | 1975 | Folk Rock | The song beautifully captures the essence of personal growth and acceptance of change. Its lyrics inspire listeners to navigate life's challenges with grace and resilience, encouraging self-reflection and personal growth. | Tags: Change, Personal Growth, Resilience | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WM7-PYtXtJM Lean On Me | Bill Withers | Friendship, Support | 1972 | Soul | This song is a comforting anthem about offering and receiving support during difficult times. Its lyrics remind listeners of the power of friendship and the importance of leaning on each other when times are tough. | Tags: Friendship, Support, Solidarity | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qkaexjc-1os Imagine | John Lennon | Hope, Peace | 1971 | Pop Rock | The song inspires listeners to envision a future full of peace and unity. Its lyrics express a hopeful message of a world free from conflict, encouraging listeners to strive for peace and unity. | Tags: Peace, Hope, Unity | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YkgkThdzX-8 I Wanna Dance with Somebody | Whitney Houston | Joy, Celebration | 1987 | Pop, R&B | This song is a joyful anthem about wanting to experience happiness and connection with others. Its catchy melody and uplifting lyrics create a sense of celebration and enjoyment. | Tags: Joy, Celebration, Connection | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eH3giaIzONA Don't Stop Believin' | Journey | Perseverance, Hope | 1981 | Rock | This song encourages listeners to maintain hope and to keep striving for their dreams, no matter the obstacles. Its lyrics inspire listeners to believe in themselves and their ability to reach their goals. | Tags: Hope, Perseverance, Motivation | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1k8craCGpgs Africa | Toto | Adventure, Nostalgia | 1982 | Rock | This song captures the spirit of adventure and the yearning for exploration. Its lyrics paint a picture of a journey through the African landscape, evoking feelings of nostalgia and longing. | Tags: Adventure, Nostalgia, Exploration | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FTQbiNvZqaY What's Going On | Marvin Gaye | Social Awareness, Empathy | 1971 | Soul | The song is a poignant call for empathy and social awareness. Its lyrics encourage listeners to pay attention to societal issues and to show compassion for others. | Tags: Social Awareness, Empathy, Compassion | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-kA3UtBj4M an anthem of youthful rebellion and the desire for freedom. Its lyrics and raw sound capture the spirit of the grunge era and resonate with anyone who has ever felt the pull of nonconformity and the urge to challenge the status quo. | Tags: Rebellion, Youth, Freedom | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTWKbfoikeg Sweet Child O' Mine | Guns N' Roses | Love, Admiration | 1987 | Hard Rock | This song beautifully captures the feelings of love and admiration. Its lyrics express deep affection for a loved one, celebrating their unique qualities and the joy they bring to life. The song's powerful melody and heartfelt lyrics make it a timeless classic. | Tags: Love, Admiration, Joy | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1w7OgIMMRc4 Heroes | David Bowie | Hope, Courage | 1977 | Art Rock | This song is a powerful anthem of hope and courage. Its lyrics inspire listeners to rise above their challenges and to strive for greatness, even in the face of adversity. The song sends a powerful message that we can all be heroes, even if just for one day. | Tags: Hope, Courage, Empowerment | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lXgkuM2NhYI Respect | Aretha Franklin | Self-Respect, Empowerment | 1967 | Soul | The song is a powerful call for respect and equality. Its lyrics encourage listeners to demand respect and to stand up for their rights. The song's message of self-respect and empowerment is as relevant today as it was when it was first released. | Tags: Self-Respect, Empowerment, Equality | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6FOUqQt3Kg0 Let It Be | The Beatles | Acceptance, Peace | 1970 | Rock | The song encourages listeners to accept the things they cannot change and to find peace in the midst of turmoil. Its soothing melody and calming lyrics provide comfort and encouragement during challenging times. | Tags: Acceptance, Peace, Comfort | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QDYfEBY9NM4 Stand By Me | Ben E. King | Loyalty, Friendship | 1961 | Soul, R&B | The song is a timeless classic about the importance of loyalty and friendship. Its lyrics promise steadfast support and companionship, expressing a deep sense of commitment and camaraderie. The song's enduring message resonates with anyone who values loyalty and friendship. | Tags: Loyalty, Friendship, Support | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hwZNL7QVJjE Hotel California | The Eagles | Perception, Mystery | 1976 | Rock | This song portrays a sense of mystery and intrigue with its cryptic lyrics. Its narrative delves into the realm of perception and the fine line between reality and illusion. The song's captivating melody and intricate guitar solos add to its enigmatic allure. | Tags: Perception, Mystery, Intrigue | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EqPtz5qN7HM Uptown Funk | Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars | Joy, Energy | 2014 | Funk-Pop | This song is a lively and energetic tune that never fails to get people on their feet. The upbeat rhythm, catchy lyrics, and Bruno Mars' dynamic vocals create a feeling of joy and exuberance. It's a perfect song to lift the mood and bring a party to life. | Tags: Joy, Energy, Celebration | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OPf0YbXqDm0 Wonderwall | Oasis | Love, Yearning | 1995 | Britpop | This song beautifully captures the feelings of love and yearning. Its heartfelt lyrics express a deep affection for someone and a longing to be there for them. The song's emotional depth and anthemic sound have made it a classic of its era. | Tags: Love, Yearning, Support | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bx1Bh8ZvH84

Lose Yourself | Eminem | Perseverance, Motivation | 2002 | Hip-Hop | This song is a powerful anthem of perseverance and motivation. Its lyrics inspire listeners to seize the moment, face their challenges head-on, and never give up. The song's driving beat and Eminem's intense delivery create a sense of urgency that can motivate anyone to push through their obstacles. | Tags: Perseverance, Motivation, Resilience | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=\_Yhyp-\_hX2s

Bohemian Rhapsody | Queen | Individuality, Rebellion | 1975 | Progressive Rock | This song is a celebration of individuality and nonconformity. Its unconventional structure and mix of musical styles reflect the band's willingness to break the rules and chart their own course. The song's message of embracing one's uniqueness and defying societal norms continues to resonate with listeners today. | Tags: Individuality, Rebellion, Nonconformity | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJ9rUzIMcZQ

Superstition | Stevie Wonder | Awareness, Skepticism | 1972 | Funk, Soul | This song uses the theme of superstition to encourage listeners to question their beliefs and not blindly follow superstitions. Its funky rhythm, catchy hook, and Stevie Wonder's powerful vocals make it an engaging and thought-provoking track. | Tags: Awareness, Skepticism, Questioning | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0CFuCYNx-1g

Hallelujah | Leonard Cohen | Faith, Struggle | 1984 | Folk Rock | This song is a profound exploration of faith, love, and personal struggle. Its deep and layered lyrics have been interpreted in various ways, reflecting the complexity of human emotions and experiences. Cohen's haunting voice and the song's beautiful melody create a timeless classic. | Tags: Faith, Struggle, Reflection | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YrLk4vdY28Q

Respect | Aretha Franklin | Empowerment, Respect | 1967 | Soul | This song is a powerful call for respect and equality. Franklin's soaring vocals deliver a strong message of self-worth and demand for respect. It has become an anthem for empowerment, resonating with listeners around the world. | Tags: Empowerment, Respect, Equality | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6FOUqQt3Kg0

Smells Like Teen Spirit | Nirvana | Rebellion, Discontent | 1991 | Grunge | This song is often seen as an anthem of the disaffected youth of the early '90s. Its raw energy, Kurt Cobain's impassioned vocals, and its theme of teenage angst and rebellion resonate with many listeners. | Tags: Rebellion, Discontent, Youth | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTWKbfoikeg

Imagine | John Lennon | Peace, Unity | 1971 | Pop, Soft Rock | This song is a beautiful plea for peace and unity. Its simple, profound lyrics envision a world without divisions where everyone lives in harmony. Lennon's sincere delivery and the song's gentle melody make it a universal message of hope. | Tags: Peace, Unity, Hope | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YkgkThdzX-8

Hey Jude | The Beatles | Comfort, Encouragement | 1968 | Rock, Pop | This song offers comfort and encouragement in times of trouble. Its lyrics are like a supportive friend, while its uplifting chorus invites listeners to sing along and let go of their worries. Its message of perseverance and positivity has made it a beloved classic. | Tags: Comfort, Encouragement, Positivity | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A\_MjCqQoLLA

Sweet Child O' Mine | Guns N' Roses | Love, Admiration | 1987 | Hard Rock | This song is a heartfelt tribute to a loved one, expressing deep affection and admiration. Its famous opening guitar riff and Axl Rose's powerful vocals make it an enduring rock classic. The song's message of love and appreciation resonates with many listeners. | Tags: Love, Admiration, Appreciation | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1w7OgIMMRc4

Lean On Me | Bill Withers | Friendship | The song is a testament to the power of friendship and the importance of leaning on others in times of need. It reminds listeners of the significance of relationships in our lives and how crucial it is to support each other during challenging times. The song's heartfelt lyrics and melody convey a sense of comfort, companionship, and mutual support. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qkaexjc-1os

Brave | Sara Bareilles | Honesty | This song encourages listeners to express themselves honestly and openly, even if it feels difficult. It's a celebration of authenticity, inspiring people to speak their truth and stand up for what they believe in. The powerful lyrics and melody convey a sense of courage, encouraging listeners to be brave in their expression. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QUQsqBqxoR4

Roar | Katy Perry | Empowerment | The song is an anthem of personal empowerment. It speaks to the strength that comes from within and the ability to rise above challenges and obstacles. The song's uplifting message encourages listeners to tap into their inner power, to stand tall, and to let their voices be heard. It's about not being afraid to assert yourself and to fight for what you want. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CevxZvSJLk8

Fight Song | Rachel Platten | Resilience | This song is an anthem of resilience and determination. It encourages listeners to keep fighting, no matter how tough things get. The song's empowering lyrics inspire listeners to stand up, fight back, and never give up on their dreams. It's a powerful reminder that everyone has the strength within them to overcome life's challenges. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xo1VInw-SKc

One Love | Bob Marley | Unity | The song is a call for unity, understanding, and love among all people. It expresses the idea that we are all connected and should treat each other with kindness and respect. The song's reggae rhythm and uplifting lyrics inspire feelings of harmony and shared humanity, making it a timeless anthem for unity and peace. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vdB-8eLEW8g

Try | Pink | Perseverance | This song encourages listeners to keep trying, even in the face of adversity. It's about not being afraid to fail and having the courage to pick yourself up and try again. The song's powerful lyrics and energetic melody inspire listeners to persevere and to keep pushing forward, no matter what. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yTCDVfMz15M

Can't Stop The Feeling | Justin Timberlake | Joy | The song captures the feeling of unabashed joy and the desire to dance and celebrate life. Its infectious beat and uplifting lyrics inspire listeners to let go of their worries and embrace the moment. It's a song that encourages people to express their happiness and to share it with others. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ru0K8uYEZWw

Three Little Birds | Bob Marley | Optimism | This song promotes a positive outlook on life, even in the face of adversity. The lyrics "Don't worry about a thing, 'Cause every little thing gonna be all right" provide comfort and reassurance, encouraging listeners to maintain an optimistic attitude and to trust in the future. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LanCLS\_hIo4

It's about not being afraid to assert yourself and to fight for what you want. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CevxZvSJLk8

Fight Song | Rachel Platten | Resilience | This song is an anthem of resilience and determination. It encourages listeners to keep fighting, no matter how tough things get. The song's empowering lyrics inspire listeners to stand up, fight back, and never give up on their dreams. It's a powerful reminder that everyone has the strength within them to overcome life's challenges. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xo1VInw-SKc

One Love | Bob Marley | Unity | The song is a call for unity, understanding, and love among all people. It expresses the idea that we are all connected and should treat each other with kindness and respect. The song's reggae rhythm and uplifting lyrics inspire feelings of harmony and shared humanity, making it a timeless anthem for unity and peace. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vdB-8eLEW8g

Try | Pink | Perseverance | This song encourages listeners to keep trying, even in the face of adversity. It's about not being afraid to fail and having the courage to pick yourself up and try again. The song's powerful lyrics and energetic melody inspire listeners to persevere and to keep pushing forward, no matter what. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yTCDVfMz15M

Can't Stop The Feeling | Justin Timberlake | Joy | The song captures the feeling of unabashed joy and the desire to dance and celebrate life. Its infectious beat and uplifting lyrics inspire listeners to let go of their worries and embrace the moment. It's a song that encourages people to express their happiness and to share it with others. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ru0K8uYEZWw

Three Little Birds | Bob Marley | Optimism | This song promotes a positive outlook on life, even in the face of adversity. The lyrics "Don't worry about a thing, 'Cause every little thing gonna be all right" provide comfort and reassurance, encouraging listeners to maintain an optimistic attitude and to trust in the future. | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LanCLS\_hIo4
